item.title: Delta How To Make Left Click Trade [EASY]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Credits: 100% me

This Tutorial Makes the NPC have the left click option to open up their shop.

So Go to your client side

Open up class5.java

Add this int public static int NPCSTRADE[] = {}; In the {} put the NPC IDS that you want to have the left-click trade. e.x {549, 546}

Under That add this

[code]for(int t : NPCSTRADE)

if(i == t) {
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[2] = “Trade”;
}[/code]

Hope this helped some people!

Read full topic
